page.title: 06ORIELTON FIELD CENTRE
page.content: My name is Kate. My sister Samantha and I live in a big Georgian mansion called Orielton. It's a Field Studies Council residential centre now, with Marine Ecology and Geography courses run for sixth formers and University students. There are also a few adult courses in summer. My dad is in charge, and also teaches, while my mum looks after the domestic side. As we have over 2000 students each year they are very busy. We have a big staff to help, 4 teachers, 2 cooks, a handyman, a bursar, 5 domestics and a secretary. Every day we provide the students with a breakfast and evening meal, plus a packed lunch. I like life at Orielton because we have 128 acres of woodlands and small lakes. Dad uses the grounds for some teaching, but we also like people with horses to use the paths, to help keep them open.
